Is this the directors cut or another version still? The directors cut came out back in the 90's, so just wondering how different this is.

Assuming the release info is correct this is the Final directors cut.  The original directors cut was little more than a studio sponsored cut to drive up sales which cut the voiceovers and added a happy ending.  This is director Ridley Scots definitive authorized cut.
